errors.no_name_given: Name has to be at least 3 chars long
errors.group_not_empty: Group cannot be deleted. There are switches that are bound to this group. Change their groupbinding first
errors.groupname_occupied: This groupname is already in use
errors.no_groups: No group was found. Please add a group first
errors.no_days_selected: You need to select at least 1 day of the week when the cronjob should be fired
errors.no_switches_selected: You need to select at least 1 switch that should be switched by the cronjob
errors.datafile_invalid: The given file does not contain a valid backup
